page.title: 10Friston Forest Picnic Area
page.content: People in the Butchershole Bottom picnic area(noon August) all seek fresh air and tranquility,car numbers suggest most live in southern England. A young married couple,university graduates from Norfolk,were spending the day walking their dog and looking for fungi in the woodland.A male runner toured the forest that morning. Older people were picnicking and exercising dogs.All believe that spending time in the open air in peaceful surroundings improves the quality of their lives.The runner expressed happiness and contentment with his job,marriage and extended family,hoping the same for his children.The graduates wanted the best education for their children.All hoped for international peace,some believing that the threat of using the nuclear bomb will help maintain peace.
